exceptions.tactic: intros orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params net net' gd d h d' H_reboot H_P H_reachable H_nwState H_nwState' H_nwPackets.
intros orig_base_params' one_node_params raft_params net net' gd d h d' H_reboot H_P H_reachable H_nwState H_nwState' H_nwPackets.
intros orig_base_params' one_node_params' raft_params net net' gd d h d' H_reboot H_P H_reachable H_nwState H_nwState' H_nwPackets.

ctx: intros orig_base_params' one_node_params' raft_params' net net' gd d h d' H_reboot H_P H_reachable H_nwState H_nwState' H_nwPackets.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface aerlli : append_entries_leaderLogs_interface orig_base_params', one_node_params' : network raft_params' : GhostSimulations.ghost_data net : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output net' : Net.name gd : raft_data d : reboot net = gd h : allEntries_leaderLogs_term orig_base_params' d' : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable orig_base_params' H_reboot : nwState orig_base_params' net' = (raft_params', net) H_P : forall h' : Net.name, nwState one_node_params' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState orig_base_params') net' (raft_params', gd) h' H_reachable : nwPackets orig_base_params' = nwPackets one_node_params' H_nwState : term H_nwState' : entry H_nwPackets : Net.name Unable to unify "forall h' : Net.name, nwState one_node_params' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState orig_base_params') net' (raft_params', gd) h'" with "In (H_nwState, H_nwState') (allEntries (fst (nwState one_node_params' H_nwPackets))) -> H_nwState = eTerm H_nwState' \\/ (exists (ll : list entry) (leader : Net.name), In (H_nwState, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState one_node_params' leader))) /\\ In H_nwState' ll)".

original: intros orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params net net' gd d h d' H_reboot H_P H_reachable H_nwState H_nwState' H_nwPackets. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot in H_P. eapply H_P; eauto.
